location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, at Sheraz [Shiraz] to Major George Willock, Tabreeze [Tabriz]

mods.abstract: The letter concerns a conference held by Persian authorities at Sheraz [Shiraz], which was attended by the Resident. It encloses copies of the proposals reached by this conference, though these proposals have not been transcribed with the letter.It notes the Resident's plans to travel to Bassidore [Bāsaʻīdū] before returning to Bushire. The remainder of the letter concerns the arrangements surrounding the forwarding of various communications.
